p: There is no fixed model for the prevention and control of ASF, a Chinese model for the control of ASF is being established with absorbing and drawing on the experiences of foreign countries. At present, due to the decline of pig stocks, and benefited from the improvement of biosafety awareness and biosecurity level of pig farms in large scale, ASF epidemic has been monitored and detected by a large number of breeding enterprises, and it is slowing down in China [ 34]. However, ASFV still exists in some pig herds and pig farms in some regions, and the epidemic of ASF in China is a constant reality [ 19]. Overall, the situation of prevention and control is still grim.
